item0.jcr:title: Query 1
item0.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo") AND s.[jcr:content/metadata/dc:creator] = "Gaurav" ORDER BY s.[jcr:content/cq:name] ASC

item1.jcr:title: Mock Outdoors Query 1
item1.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo/sample-assets-2")

item2.jcr:title: Mock Outdoors Query - sort by file name ascending
item2.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo/sample-assets-2") ORDER BY NAME(s) ASC

item3.jcr:title: Mock Outdoors Query - sort by file name descending
item3.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo/sample-assets-2") ORDER BY NAME(s) DESC

item4.jcr:title: Get Outside Query 1 - sort by file name ascending
item4.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo/sample-assets-2") ORDER BY NAME(s) ASC

item5.jcr:title: Get Outside Query 2 - sort by file name descending
item5.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/dynamic-deck-dynamo/sample-assets-2") ORDER BY NAME(s) DESC
